DEFAULT_PURGE.description: Time period for purging system messages (Days)

config.statement: DELETE FROM SYSTEM_MESSAGES_LINK WHERE MESSAGE_ID IN (SELECT MESSAGE_ID FROM SYSTEM_MESSAGES WHERE creation_stamp <= (localtimestamp - interval '%%value:DEFAULT_PURGE%%' day))
DELETE FROM SYSTEM_MESSAGES WHERE creation_stamp <= (localtimestamp - interval '%%value:DEFAULT_PURGE%%' day)
DELETE FROM CHP_NOTIFICATION WHERE creation_stamp <= (localtimestamp - interval '%%value:DEFAULT_PURGE%%' day) LIMIT 10000
